title: Soltero Cotizado
overview: Hosted by the charismatic Montserrat Oliver, this show follows heartthrob Nicola Porcella, known as the "golden bachelor," on a Caribbean adventure filled with love, drama, and unexpected twists.  In a luxurious island mansion, Nicola will navigate a group of sensual women, all vying for his attention and affection. But not everyone is what they seem. Some are genuine romantics seeking true love, while others are driven by ambition and a desire for the show's cash prize.  Living in a nearby villa, the women will be constantly monitored as they compete in various challenges to earn coveted dates with Nicola. The stakes are high, as Nicola is looking for a genuine connection. However, there's a twist: if Nicola chooses a contestant who is deceiving him, she could win the $50,000 prize!  Nicola Porcella, a well-known Peruvian television personality, brings his charisma and likability to the show. After his successful stint on "La Casa de los Famosos México," he's ready to tackle a new challenge: finding love in a tropical paradise while surrounded by a group of women willing to do anything to win his heart.
